channel.description: Keep a user sign-in session alive with a refresh token Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 123 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: This takes the implementation content from https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/refresh-tokens/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.
